item.title: [Paper Presentation] SIMBICON and GENBICON: Physics Based Control Models for Locomotion
item.description: Presented two seminal models of physics-based walking, called SIMBICON and GENBICON. The course instructor KangKang Yin is the inventor of SIMBICON.
